greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations p of [2n] having no index i with |p(i)-i| = n.
comment: Also 0th term of the 2n-th forward differences of n!.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..225
maple: b:= proc(n, k) b(n, k):= `if`(k=0, n!, b(n+1, k-1) -b(n, k-1)) end:
mathematica: a /@ Range[0, 23] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 02 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 22 2019
